name: 2023 HCHS TSA Video Game Design Submission
name_original: 2023 HCHS TSA Video Game Design Submission
description:
In this game you play as Max, who goes through three different puzzle challenges in his dream.

To start the game you use the up and down keys to select "Start Game" on the title screen and from there you choose your save file and then are put into a character creator which ultimately means nothing.

Then you are put into the game where you can move around with the arrow keys and push the boxes around by walking into them

You can talk to your guide named Purple Max by walking up to him and pressing Z 

To beat each challenge you must push all the boxes on to the gray switches, then talk to Purple Max and go into the teleporter, do this 3 times and you win!
